00005 #include <lang/pp.h>
00006 #include <math/float3.h>

00016 class Domain
00017 {
00018 public:
00022     enum DomainType
00023     {
00025         DOMAIN_NONE,
00027         DOMAIN_CONSTANT,
00029         DOMAIN_RANGE,
00031         DOMAIN_POINT,
00033         DOMAIN_SPHERE,
00035         DOMAIN_LINE,
00037         DOMAIN_BOX,
00039         DOMAIN_CYLINDER,
00041         DOMAIN_DISK,
00043         DOMAIN_RECTANGLE,
00045         DOMAIN_TRIANGLE,
00047         DOMAIN_COUNT
00048     };
00049 
00051     Domain();
00052 
00054     void        setConstant( float c );
00055 
00057     void        setRange( float x0, float x1 );
00058 
00060     void        setPoint( const float3& point );
00061 
00063     void        setSphere( const float3& center, float inradius, float outradius );
00064 
00066     void        setLine( const float3& start, const float3& end );
00067 
00069     void        setBox( const float3& mindim, const float3& maxdim );
00070 
00072     void        setCylinder( const float3& start, const float3& end, float inradius, float outradius );
00073 
00075     void        setDisk( const float3& origin, const float3& normal, float inradius, float outradius );
00076 
00078     void        setRectangle( const float3& origin, const float3& u, const float3& v );
00079 
00081     void        setTriangle( const float3& v0, const float3& v1, const float3& v2 );
00082 
00084     void        setType( DomainType type );
00085 
00089     void        setParameter( int i, float value );
00090 
00096     float3      getRandomFloat3() const;
00097 
00103     float       getRandomFloat() const;
00104 
00111     void        getRandom( float3* v ) const            {*v=getRandomFloat3();}
00112 
00119     void        getRandom( float* v ) const             {*v=getRandomFloat();}
00120 
00124     float       getParameter( int i ) const;
00125 
00129     bool        isZero() const                          {return m_type == DOMAIN_CONSTANT && m_data.constant.c == 0.f;}
00130 
00134     DomainType  type() const                            {return m_type;}
00135 
00139     const char* toString() const;
00140 
00145     static DomainType   toDomainType( const char* str );
00146 
00150     static int          getParameterCount( DomainType type );
00151 
00152 private:
00153     struct Constant
00154     {
00155         float c;
00156     };
00157 
00158     struct Range
00159     {
00160         float x0, x1;
00161     };
00162 
00163     struct Point
00164     {
00165         float x, y, z;
00166     };
00167 
00168     struct Sphere
00169     {
00170         float x, y, z;
00171         float r1, r2;
00172     };
00173 
00174     struct Line
00175     {
00176         float x1, y1, z1;
00177         float x2, y2, z2;
00178     };
00179 
00180     struct Box
00181     {
00182         float x1, y1, z1;
00183         float x2, y2, z2;
00184     };
00185 
00186     struct Cylinder
00187     {
00188         float x1, y1, z1;
00189         float x2, y2, z2;
00190         float r1, r2;
00191     };
00192 
00193     struct Disk
00194     {
00195         float ox, oy, oz;
00196         float nx, ny, nz;
00197         float r1, r2;
00198     };
00199 
00200     struct Rectangle
00201     {
00202         float ox, oy, oz;
00203         float ux, uy, uz;
00204         float vx, vy, vz;
00205     };
00206 
00207     struct Triangle
00208     {
00209         float ox, oy, oz;
00210         float ux, uy, uz;
00211         float vx, vy, vz;
00212     };
00213 
00214     union DomainData
00215     {
00216         Constant    constant;
00217         Range       range;
00218         Point       point;
00219         Sphere      sphere;
00220         Line        line;
00221         Box         box;
00222         Cylinder    cylinder;
00223         Disk        disk;
00224         Rectangle   rectangle;
00225         Triangle    triangle;
00226     };
00227 
00228     DomainData  m_data;
00229     DomainType  m_type;
00230 };
